attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole thing is being brought into disrepute when nearly a third of petitions have only 10 signatures and but a hundred or so ever reach a thousand. It doesn't serve to strenghten the democratic process, it weakens it. Please formulate some rules so that petitions really do become genuine petitions not just a "letter" signed by a few people.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
